amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the provision of the bill prohibiting the use of funds for the deployment of certain low-yield ballistic missile warheads and requires the Secretary of Defense to certify on the availability of proportional response options.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 386 printed in Part B of House Report 116-413 to strike the provision relating to the prohibition on the use of funds for the deployment of low-yield ballistic missile warheads and requires the Secretary of Defense to certify on the availability of proportional response options.
